message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go as low as $90.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $105?
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my budget. I propose we settle at $95 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
